revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Reversal Mountain |image = [[File:Reversal Mountain.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Reversal Mountain. |tokens = 226,500 |location = Unova Route 14 }} '''Reversal Mountain''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
